description.value:
When you hold this sleek, shiny gray wand, you hear a faint chorus of overlapping whispers.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mind Probe]. The first time the target rolls a success at a Deception check to mislead your probe, it gets a result one step worse than it rolled. This means you learn the answer if the target's Deception check would have succeeded, and you learn nothing rather than believing a falsehood if the check would have been a critical success.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mind Probe].
